content:
• Start Windows in safe mode with networking enabled - https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/help/12376/windows-10-start-your-pc-in-safe-mode
  • Still In Windows safe mode, start Thunderbird in Troubleshoot Mode - https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/troubleshoot-mode-thunderbird

Does problem go away? What is your version number?

content:
I will try to assist here. - For many/most email clients, there is the option available to set the option to either include original correspondence or to ignore original correspondence. That option appears to have been set for those people replying to you, as Thunderbird has no facility to remove portions of messages.

- Regarding spam, this is a teaching process, wherein you can click messages that are flagged as spam and click 'not spam' and return to desired folder. It is generally advised to do this periodically for both good and spam messsages to help Thunderbird 'learn' how to manage your email. This article provides more information: 

https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/kb/thunderbird-and-junk-spam-messages
creator: davidsk

content:
Questa estensione sembra fare ciò che chiedi ed è compatibile anche con la versione attuale di Thunderbird tbkeys-lite -> https://addons.thunderbird.net/en-US/thunderbird/addon/tbkeys-lite/

Probabilmente dovrai studiarti un po' la documentazione -> https://github.com/wshanks/tbkeys

content: The message indicates that there is a password issue with your email provider. If there have been no changes, it may be that the server requirements have changed. If you post your incoming server settings, some suggestions may be forthcoming. Thank you.

content: Some like threading, some don't. This URL that I'm listing gives full info on disabling it, and also info on how to set up Thunderbird in the future and have unthreading as the default initially. https://support.mozilla.org/en-US/questions/1439822
creator: davidsk
